verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> vay-Hi came כִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> chish-Mo-a' heard כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei And it came to pass when all the kings הָאֱמֹרִ֡י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּעֵ֨בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver which [were] on the side הַיַּרְדֵּ֜ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den of Jordan יָ֗מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah, westward וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all מַלְכֵ֤י <WH4428> mal-Chei and all the kings הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni of the Canaanites אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> hai-Yam, which [were] by the sea אֵ֠ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who הוֹבִ֨ישׁ <WH3001> ho-Vish had dried up יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֵ֧י <WH4325> mei the waters הַיַּרְדֵּ֛ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den of Jordan מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from before בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until; עָבְרָנוּ 'a-ve-ra-nu כעָבְרָ֑ם <WH5674> 'a-ve-Ram; alienate קוַיִּמַּ֣ס <WH4549> vai-yim-Mas melted לְבָבָ֗ם <WH3824> le-va-Vam, that their heart וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no הָ֨יָה <WH1961> Ha-yah came בָ֥ם vam עוֹד֙ <WH5750> 'Od any ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach, neither was there spirit מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei in them any more because בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel ס sa-Mek
